```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(d3heatmap)
library(flexdashboard)

inp <- "C:\\VF\\telecom-complaints.csv"
inp_df <- read.csv(inp, row.names = 1)
```

### Stats by Player {data-width=650}

```{r}
d3heatmap(inp_df, scale = "column", na.rm = T, colors = 'YlOrRd',Rowv = F,Colv = F)
```

### Top Scorers {data-width=350}

```{r}
knitr::kable(inp_df)
```
